text: Ra juna dina hamile pratyeka samudayabata svayam unimathi saksi ubhya'une chaum, ra (he paigambara) tapa'ila'i yiniharumathi saksi bana'era lya'une chaum, ra hamile tapa'imathi (yasto) kitaba utareka chaum ki yasama hareka kurako varnana bistarapurvaka cha. Ra musalamanaharuko lagi margadarsana ra daya tatha subhasandesa
